- - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Mary, I totally understand – believe me! Whenever you are ready to speak I will be here, no rush or worries what so ever. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Mary Federico [mailto:mary.federico@obstrategies.com] Sent: Monday, April 23, 2012 11:12 AM To: Sara Conde; 'Randall Thacker' Subject: RE: MBO Partners Hi Sara –Yes, I’d like to hear back from AHIMA first. But even if we don’t get a positive response from them, I would like to talk to you and learn more about MBO Partners. Just can’t put it at the top of the to do list yet.Thanks!--Mary Mary Federicomary.federico@obstrategies.com1-917-217-1628www.obstrategies.com From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:mary.federico@obstrategies.com> Sent: Thursday, April 19, 2012 6:28 PM To: Randall Thacker Cc: mary.federico@obstrategies.com <mailto:mary.federico@obstrategies.com> Subject: RE: MBO Partners Hi Randall and Mary, That’s fine with me. Thanks for letting me know. Take care,Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files. From: Randall Thacker [mailto:randallthacker@principlesource.com] <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com> Sent: Thursday, April 19, 2012 6:22 PM To: Sara Conde Cc: mary.federico@obstrategies.com <mailto:mary.federico@obstrategies.com> Subject: Re: MBO Partners Sara, I think Mary wants to wait until we hear from the potential client.
On Apr 19, 2012, at 5:56 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com> wrote:Dear Mary, Hello, my name is Sara Conde, a Consultant Services Advisor with MBO Partners. I received your contact information from Randall Thacker. Randall suggest we reivew MBO Services and set you up with an account for your work with him. You can schedule a convenient time by using my online calendar. I look forward to speaking with you, Sara___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.comw: www.mbopartners.com Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential.
